School Management System Module

school_management_system.add_course()[source]

Add a course to the courses table in the SQLite database. The course’s name and ID are taken from the entry fields.

school_management_system.add_instructor()[source]

Add an instructor to the instructors table in the SQLite database. The instructor’s name and ID are taken from the entry fields.

school_management_system.add_student()[source]

Add a student to the students table in the SQLite database. The student’s name, age, and ID are taken from the entry fields.

school_management_system.assign_instructor_to_course()[source]

Assign a selected instructor to a selected course. Updates the instructor_course table in the database.

school_management_system.assign_student_to_course()[source]

Assign a selected student to a selected course. Updates the student_course table in the database.

school_management_system.backup_database()[source]

Create a backup of the current database file. The backup is stored as ‘school_management_backup.db’.

school_management_system.delete_record()[source]

Delete a record (student or instructor assignment) from the treeview and the database.

school_management_system.fetch_latest_data()[source]

Fetch the latest data from the database and refresh the treeview.

school_management_system.get_all_courses()[source]

Fetch all course records from the courses table.

Returns:

Each tuple contains information about a course.

Return type:

List of tuples

school_management_system.get_all_instructors()[source]

Fetch all instructor records from the instructors table.

Returns:

Each tuple contains information about an instructor.

Return type:

List of tuples

school_management_system.get_all_students()[source]

Fetch all student records from the students table.

Returns:

Each tuple contains information about a student.

Return type:

List of tuples

school_management_system.refresh_tree()[source]

Refresh the treeview widget to display the latest data from the database. Populates the treeview with both student and instructor assignments.

school_management_system.reset_search()[source]

Reset the search field and refresh the treeview to display all records again.

school_management_system.search_records()[source]

Search for records in the treeview based on user input in the search field. Filters records by matching student names, instructor names, or course names.

Indices and tables
